text: cucumber pear juice is a wonderful
winter tonic it's super hydrating great
way to use up all the extra pears you
picked up at the farmers market
especially ones that have been maybe on
your counter for a little while and
they're nice and ripe and ready to go
great opportunity for a juice I'm
starting with one pear very ripe just
taking out the core just move any
discolored parts okay now these pears
are so soft you really don't need to
chop them up much more for the juicer
one cucumber which I'm just going to
roughly chop here cucumber super
hydrating full of vitamin K there we go
so we have everything we have one
cucumber chopped one pear quartered
three stalks of celery which are great
for digestive health and one inch of
ginger sliced so let's get juicing
okay beautiful color here now if you get
stuck on one sort of juice blend for the
whole year you should really consider
swapping up for the seasons this is a
perfect one for the cooler weather
months whew smells great let's try mmm
YUM super tasty great way to refresh and
rehydrate
